response: Yes, we have an original and a plus and they both work the same.

context: So does it go up to 2000 DPI or 4000 DPI?
response: If you download the anker software it's goes up to 4000

context: I'm curious about the buttons behind the scroll wheel. In some images one of them is raised and in others they're not. Are they normal buttons?
response: Yes, they are normal buttons. The one furthest from the mouse wheel is raised a bit.

context: Does this come with the bluetooth wireless chat adapter as shown in the photo?
response: Yes,  for the 360 controller.

context: I wana play ps1 and 2 games can i
response: This is a genuine machine. Only run ps3 games.

context: When I try to launch the game I get an message that says to insert the original game disc. That is what I believe I have done. I have Win 8& 4 discs ?
response: Try patching if not try an xp machine I use one as a backup for older games on discs never fails.

context: Do I need to have played Oblivion to understand Skyrim?
response: Not, absolutely not. They happend houndred years in between so they are almost independent from one another. The only thing is if you pick up books on Skyrim, you will find some that talk about the Oblivion Crisis. No more than that.

context: Does it come with the headset
response: The one I bought didn't but it didn't show a headset on the cover either.

context: Does buying this come with a subscription?
response: For the first month yes.

context: Is Whistleblower included in this or do you have to buy that seperately?
response: It is not included.

context: does the product come with a controler
response: Yes, it does come with one controller and a cable for recharging.  Cable is USB to Mini USB.

context: Does this player have typical internet access such as facebook?
response: There's no internet or wifi feature.

context: Can I use it with Windows Vista?
response: Yes, but highly recommend you go to Windows 7.  Skip 8!

context: Does it work well?
response: Yes it does ive had a problem with it but amazon fixed it right away everything is perfectly fine now.

context: does it work on windows 8, 64 bit?
response: Yes, it does. My husband's computer is has Windows 8.

context: Can this be used to charge other devices via USB?
response: Yes it can be used to charge other devices, but the unit itself does not come with a cord to charge itself. The charger needs to be charged with the PS Vita proprietary cord.

context: can 2 or more people play simultaneously, or do they take turns (e.g., mario kart)
response: You can do 4 people simultaneously (even more if you buy extra equipment).  When you purchase a game just look at the back of the cover and see how many players it is made for.

context: Bought one from a seller and it played games fine for them.The GBA SP won't play games when I try to. Broken console?
response: Probably, talk to the sellers. Or maybe it's your games?

context: When you click the mouse is the sound, soft or loud?  I need one that has as low noise as possible when clicking.
response: It's okI think is soft not too loud

context: Can I use this headset for voice chat only?  (Game Sounds still coming out of the tv.)
response: Yes you can... the adapter has buttons where you can adjust the percentage of voice/game volume. If you hit the voice button until it beeps, you will only hear voice :)

context: When you "stash" the mic, does it mute? I would like this to act like PTT during games.
response: sadly stashing the mic doesn't mute the headphone. the volume and the channels are all controlled by the mixer on the cord

context: Does it work for reading PSX/PSOne memory cards?
response: It didn't even work for my PS2. It was meant to because its specs were in line with my PS2 version and still only two controllers worked.

context: will this work with windows 8 on a PC
response: It works with Windows 8.1 but you need to manually install some runtime components in order to get them to work. They have to be run manually.

context: So do you need an online pass to play it if you buy it used?
response: Hey there!Nope:) nice thing about black ops is there's no separate purchase to play online.

context: does it have english subtitle? can i play online if im in the US
response: No it doesn't have english sub but yeah you can play online

context: I have a Sony non Bluetooth CD player and I was going to order a Bluetooth transmitter for it. Will these headphones pickup from that transmitter?
response: Yes they Will connect to any other blues tooth device

context: Can I use my 360 controllers with the new system? Thanks!
response: No, the Xbox One and Xbox 360 use different controllers

context: Does this game work on windows 7 ?
response: yes my son is using it on his windows 7.

context: If we purchase Quickbooks from Amazon, does Intuit still provide support?  They tell me that you may not get their actual product.  Is this true?
response: Not sure who "they" are, but you get genuine QuickBooks and whatever support is advertised with the particular package you may purchase.  I have both QuickBooks 2012 (single), and QuickBooks 2013, 3 user.

context: I have read lots of complaints about people receiving the wrong model for their vita. I have the original vita, will this grip work for that model?
response: The answer is yes. I also have the original Vita and it works great.
